jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.name: Independent Contracting
jobs.content: Provide monthly maintenance and contracted projects to clients (such as OneMission Fundraising, http://onemission.fund) on a variety of technology stacks.

jobs.title: Project Lead
jobs.name: TapOnIt
jobs.content: Built software responsible for sending mass text messages to over 50,000 recipients within a minimal time span to users who opt-in through short code, including user segmentation based on demographics and session based two-way interactions with user.  Managed infrastructure growth on AWS to meet increasing use and demand. software engineer,

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.name: MetaCommunications
jobs.content: Built startup app ‘ProofMe’, a platform to facilitate work collaboration and review supporting a wide variety of multimedia. Responsible for maintenance and development of full technology stack including AWS server configuration, Riak database management, Node.JS development and design.

jobs.title: Javascript Engineer
jobs.name: Leepfrog Technologies
jobs.content: Developed and maintained collegiate course catalog publishing solutions utilizing proprietary JavaScript CMS platform 'CourseLeaf' for hundreds of institutions such as Berkeley University.

education.title: BS – Double Major in Biology and Computer Science
education.subtitle: Specialized in Bioinformatics Research
education.name: University of Iowa
education.content: Using computational methods to identify the function, evolutionary history, and phylogenetic relationships of genes.

education.title: Xenolog Research Project
education.name: University of Iowa
education.content: Developed algorithms and Perl programs in a parallel computing environment to identify horizontally transferred genes in Eukaryotes.
